title: Top Class Divine Doctor - Novel Updates
tags: Doctors   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Modern Day
author: 贱走偏锋
description: A car accident gave Liu Chu, a highschool dropout that’s met with hardships at every turn, insurmountable demonic powers. Watch how the protagonist relies on his kind heart to control that power and bring salvation to the world. This is the tale of the legendary divine doctor.>
